trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_07010_000010_METEM<tab>A rookie on the rise with razor-sharp claws─the ferocious feline Black Cat!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07010_000030_METEM<tab>The match is decided! Victory goes to the challenger!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07010_000040_METEM<tab>The starlet with a sting─the adorable-but-deadly, sweet-but-poisonous Honey B. Lovely!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07010_000050_METEM<tab>Tonight he explodes in the ring once more... The man you love to hate with a fiery passion─the Brute Bomber!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07010_000060_METEM<tab>Wielding both magic and machina, she's a witch for a new age. The wondrous Wicked Thunder!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07010_000070_WICKEDTHUNDER<tab>Damn it... No choice but to withdraw.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07010_000080_METEM<tab>In a shocking turn of events, Wicked Thunder has fled the ring! Our unstoppable upstart is victorious!
